author: IGN
description:
Hey all! In today's fix we go over how to fix the Switch 2 battery indicator issue which shows less battery life than what’s left and the surprise announcement of the new Splatoon spin-off, Splatoon Raiders. 

Presented by MindsEye.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Has a Fix if Your Switch 2 Battery Says Its Dying, But It's Not - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Now that the relase of the Nintendo Switch 2 has come and gone, we finally get to play The Legend of Zelda: Wind Waker in 4K on Nintendo's new console. Available only through the Nintendo Online subscription service, Wind Waker can be accessed through the Nintendo GameCube app. Relive your childhood in glorious 4K in a 4:3 aspect ratio. Unfortunatley, Wind Waker is does not have a 16:9 widesceen mode available on Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: The Legend of Zelda: Wind Waker Gameplay on Switch 2 in 4K

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer for Pioner, a first-person survival shooter developed by GFA Games. Players will dive into a vast open world to craft, defeat enemies, and manage resources gathered through a dynamic world. Take on PvE and PvP missions that tell a deep narrative alongside the first-person carnage that makes use of an array of weapons. Pioner is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now as part of Steam Next Fest.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Pioner - Official Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Director's Cut Launch Trailer for MindsEye, a third-person action adventure open world game developed by Build a Rocket Boy. Players will embody Jacob Diaz, a former elite soldier with a mysterious neural implant that haunts him with memories of past traumatic missions. Uncover the truth of it all with intense shooting gameplay, a vast open world to explore, and more. MindsEye is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: MindsEye - Official Director's Cut Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Rainbow Six Siege X, a new iteration of the tactical first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft. Players will be able to access a suite of new major upgrades and changes to the core game alongside new game modes and more. Rainbow Six Siege X is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Ubisoft+, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, Ubisoft Connect, and Windows PC).

#RainbowSixSiegeX #Gaming #IGN
title: Rainbow Six Siege X - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After watching Mouse: P.I. for Hire being played in front of me, we're even more impressed by this hand-drawn, Steamboat Willy-era black-and-white animated first-person shooter. IGN's Ryan McCaffrey tells you about the demo he saw.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mouse: P.I. for Hire Is Super Impressive in Person

author: IGN
description:
Tom Cruise pushes death-defying stunts to the next level in Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning.
Our lives are the sum of our choices. Tom Cruise is Ethan Hunt in Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning.
title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning - Aerial Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Tom Cruise

author: IGN
description:
The Echo Paradox is a first-person psychological horror game. Humanity stands on the brink of an unsettling revelation – alternate dimensions are real, but eerily without signs of life.
The Echo Paradox will release on Steam on July 1st, 2025.
title: The Echo Paradox - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Mario Kart World is packed with unlockable characters, but figuring out how to get them all can be tricky! In this video, we’ll walk you through exactly how to unlock Main Characters, Character Outfits, and NPC Drivers in Mario Kart World. Whether you're trying to play as King Boo, grab all of Mario’s 10 outfits, or race as a Pianta, this guide has everything you need! We'll also show you which Grand Prix cups unlock specific characters, how food items affect character outfits, how to trigger rare Kamek transformations, and provide tips to unlock everything as quickly as possible.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Mario Kart World: Beginner’s Guide to Unlocking Characters

title: There was a rideable Monodon from ARK: Aquatica at #IGNLive Presented by  @SnailGamesUSA

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at Ahoy in this cinematic trailer for the upcoming multiplayer naval sailing game by Capstan Games, where you can trade goods and engage in naval combat with your fellow seamen. Ahoy will be available on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store). A Kickstarter campaign for Ahoy is available now.

Ahoy is a multiplayer voyage to the 1780s. Cooperate with fellow captains and officers to explore the West Indies. Trade goods, manage your Player and NPC crew, and engage in ferocious naval battles. Master seamanship to forge a legacy in this historically accurate representation of the Age of Sail.
title: Ahoy - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) Character Trailer for Bleach Rebirth of Souls, an action fighting game developed by Tamsoft Corporation. Players can get the rundown on Ichigo Kurosaki, a formidable character whose style is characterized by high adaptability, allowing him to fight flexibly against any opponent. Get a look at the latest trailer to get the rundown on the moves, abilities, and techinques of Ichigo Kurosaki, coming soon to Bleach Rebirth of Souls with DLC 1 on June 17 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Bleach Rebirth of Souls - Official Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Join developer Hangar 13 for a behind-the-scenes look at Mafia: The Old Country. The team discusses how the art and technology bring the world and characters of the action-adventure game to life. Mafia: The Old Country will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam on August 8, 2025.
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Official Art and Technology Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: EVE Frontier is, if nothing else, an intriguing experiment in the making. It could be an absolute trash fire, and I remain actively wary of its blockchain and cryptocurrency elements. But I did have fun playing the small bit of it we got access to, and it is an enticing invitation to settle and develop fresh empires in a blank slate galaxy with no major NPC factions to work around. Previewed by Leana Hafer
title: EVE Frontier Wants to Fully Hand the Galaxy Over to the Players

author: IGN
description:
From Edmund McMillen, creator of Binding of Isaac and Super Meat Boy, comes an endless cat breeding turn-based tactical roguelite RPG. Mewgenics comes to Steam on February 10, 2026.

#Mewgenics #Gaming #IGN
title: Mewgenics - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Your path to Awakening begins now. The stage is set. Let the spice flow. Check out the latest Dune: Awakening trailer for this multiplayer survival game. Survive the sandworm, craft your ornithopter, build a fortress, and ascend to power in an open world Arrakis shared with hundreds of other players. Dune: Awakening is available now on PC (Steam). It will be available on Xbox Series X/S and PlayStation 5 (PS5) in 2026.

#DuneAwakening #Gaming #IGN
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Your Path to Awakening Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Jobs. Crisis Kits. Altered Items. Clearing the crisis. Taking on the Hiss. Get a deep dive into the gameplay and what you can expect from FBC: Firebreak in this latest trailer for the upcoming 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order. 

FBC: Firebreak will be available on PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on June 17, 2025.

#FBCFirebreak #Gaming #IGN
title: FBC: Firebreak - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Does Ninja Gaiden still work in 2025, in a world where soulslikes dominate the high-skill action game subgenre? I played Ninja Gaiden 4 for the first time last weekend, and my answer is unequivocally, yes, absolutely, 1000%, Ninja Gaiden not only still works in 2025, but it is a high-speed, stylish breath of fresh air. It was my favorite thing I played amongst all of the games I covered at this past weekend’s various showcases, and as someone who considers Ninja Gaiden Black the finest action game ever made, I left incredibly happy. Previewed by Ryan McCaffrey.
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 First Hands-On Impressions: It’s Faster and Bloodier Than Ever

author: IGN
description: When I set my arcade stick down after about an hour with Invincible VS, I felt pretty good. Trying a new fighting game is a lot like driving a new car for the first time. You’ve got a general idea of what you’re getting, but the devil’s in the details. I left pretty pleased with my test drive. Previewed by Will Borger
title: Invincible VS Is a Brutal, Bloody 3v3 Tag Fighter

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Eddington trailer for this upcoming movie. Eddington stars Joaquin Phoenix, Pedro Pascal, Luke Grimes, Deirdre O'Connell, Micheal Ward, Amélie Hoeferle, Clifton Collins Jr., William Belleau, with Austin Butler and Emma Stone. 

In May of 2020, a standoff between a small-town sheriff (Joaquin Phoenix) and mayor (Pedro Pascal) sparks a powder keg as neighbor is pitted against neighbor in Eddington, New Mexico.

Eddington, directed by Ari Aster, opens in theaters on July 18, 2025.

#Eddington #Movies #IGN
title: Eddington - Official Trailer (2025) Joaquin Phoenix, Pedro Pascal, Emma Stone

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Accolades Trailer for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, the action turn-based story-driven RPG developed by Sandfall Interactive. Players will embark on a journey to slay the Paintress once and for all as Expedition 33. Make use of engaging turn-based combat, powerful upgrades and abilities, and explore the world of Lumiere and all it inhabits. Take a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#ClairObscurExpedition33 #Gaming #IGN
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Splatoon video for updates on the series, including the Splatoon Raiders announcement for an upcoming Splatoon spinoff game. In the role of a mechanic, players will go on an adventure in the mysterious Spirhalite Islands alongside the splat-tacular Deep Cut trio. Splatoon Raiders will be available on Nintendo Switch 2. 

The new Splatoon research report from Squid Research Lab video also unveils that a free update for Splatoon 3 will be available on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 on June 12, 2025. The Splatoon 3 update features the Splatlands collection, with new weapons from the Barazushi and Emberz brands. Additionally, all weapon Freshness caps will be raised, a new stat will be added for Anarchy Battle (Series) called Series Weapon Power, and Urchin Underpass, which is a returning stage from the original Splatoon game on Wii U, will be added to the stage rotation. The new update allows Splatoon 3 players on Nintendo Switch 2 to experience more detailed
title: Splatoon Raiders - Official Announcement and Splatoon 3 Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Writer of 28 Years Later, Alex Garland explains director, Danny Boyle's love of subversion in the genre and how it applies in their horror zombie sequel, 28 Year Later.

28 Years Later debuts exclusively in US movie theaters on June 20, 2025, and comes to UK cinemas on June 19. The film is directed by Danny Boyle and written by Alex Garland. Its executive producer is Cillian Murphy. It's produced by Andrew Macdonald, Peter Rice, Bernard Bellew, Danny Boyle, Alex Garland.

#28YearsLater #Movies #Trailer
title: 28 Years Later - 'Subversion' Official Featurette (2025) Jodie Comer, Aaron Taylor-Johnson

author: IGN
description:
Learn how to conquer solo expeditions in Elden Ring: Nightreign from a professional speedrunner! Brendon "Hazeblade" Lillie breaks down pro solo tips, character builds, relic optimization, and how to survive until your Nightlord showdown.

Whether you're a beginner looking for guidance or a seasoned Nightfarer going solo for the first time, this step-by-step solo guide has everything you need to dominate Elden Ring: Nightreign without a team.

00:00 - Intro
00:26 - The Benefits of Solo Play
01:02 - Character Selection
03:42 - Relics
04:50 - Optimizing Your Runs
05:38 - Map Details Matter
06:34 - Check the Merchant Shops
07:36 - Always Be Leveling
07:57 - Remember What You’re Running Into
09:29 - Avoid Gank Bosses (Usually)
10:34 - Keep an Eye Out for Time-Savers
11:59 - Your Goal Before Facing the Nightlord
12:26 - Don’t Rush Day 3!
13:17 - Focus on the Moves
13:58 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming #EldenRingNightreign
title: Elden Ring Nightreign: Pro Speedrunner Shows You How to Play SOLO

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the Planetologist in this latest Dune: Awakening trailer for the multiplayer survival game. Their training is extensive as they are the frontline exploration force of any new planet discovered by the Imperium. Planetologists are driven by curiosity. Their skillset is invaluable to anyone hoping to make a life on Arrakis and includes improved harvesting methods, expert vehicle maintenance, and even water discipline.

Dune: Awakening is available now on PC for Deluxe and Ultimate Edition owners and on June 10, 2025 for Standard Edition owners.
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Schools of the Imperium: The Planetologist Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today’s daily fix we talk about the possible return of Halo Combat Evolved in the form of a remake on Unreal Enginge 5 and accurately depicted cow butts in Nintendo’s Mario Kart World in playable new animal character Moo Moo Cow. And we have a special look at the new single-player action-adventure thriller, MindsEye.
Presented by MindsEye.
title: Xbox's "Return of a Classic" Tease Could Be a Halo Remake - IGN Daily Fix

description:
When Fiona left her job and moved to the country to become a farmer, she never imagined she would meet a dead god, much less become its undying avatar. Wishlist Neverway on Steam now.
